name: hdwallet-sandbox
buildCommand: yarn lerna run build --scope @keepkey/hdwallet-core && yarn lerna run build --scope @keepkey/hdwallet-sandbox --ignore @keepkey/hdwallet-keepkey-nodehid --include-dependencies && ls -la && ls -la examples/ && ls -la examples/sandbox/ && mkdir -p public && cp -r examples/sandbox/public/* public/
